titles.title: Protecting Interstate Transport Act of 2021
A bill to prohibit States from regulating certain commercial motor vehicle service contracts, and for other purposes.
Protecting Interstate Transport Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Protecting Interstate Transport Act of 2021
This bill limits state authority over intrastate transportation by prohibiting states from regulating certain commercial motor vehicle service contracts.
